condition.narrative: Should contribute directly to results for children as outlined in the UNDAF, national results and/or UNICEF Strategic Plan and within the scope defined in the CPD, CPAP, OMP or other agreed upon programme documents

title.narrative: Output 4.2: Community support systems are strengthened to promote timely uptake of an integrated package of HIV services by pregnant women, their infants, partners and families, and by adolescents

description.narrative: The HIV response in UNICEF supported states have gained traction in strengthening of community support systems and increasing the participation of AYP. Over 95 UNICEF supported LGAs spread over 8 1 states achieved increasing levels AYP participation, capacity strengthening and delivery of timely uptake of an integrated package of HIV services by pregnant women, their infants, partners and families, and by adolescents. | Status:On-track | As-of Date:31/12/2019

title.narrative: Percentage of UNICEF-supported LGAs with community action platforms that promote uptake of HIV services by pregnant women, their infants, partners and families, and by adolescents
Percentage of the community action platforms in UNICEF-supported LGAs in which the most vulnerable adolescents actively participate
